title: AE预设：路径箭头动画 Path Arrow + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 此预设可以在AE中直接制作路径箭头动画，可调节箭头的长、宽、运动速度、描边等多种参数。预设支持Adobe After Effects CS 6 – CC 2015.3。The After Effects Path Arrow Preset works with Text Animators, and a path. It will build you an arrow that you can easily animate around as you would any other text animator in AE.

download_links.name: AE预设：路径箭头动画 Path Arrow + 使用教程
